R$/share (1) 0.73 0.66 0.56 0.56 0.50 0.44 0.71 0.78 0.76 0.26 Dividends paid 92% 83% 119% 80% 67% 60% 88% 85% 82% 28% Capitalization Market Capitalization (2) 279,979 257,498 334,314 241,791 293,746 246,255 242,779 228,693 216,240 184,995 Net Debt -10,233 -2,763 -7,813 -9,054 -8,852 -13,998 -15,411 -11,536 -12,835 -26,385 Minority Interest 455 537 519 353 408 353 452 433 433 410 Outstanding Shares (million) 15,696 15,697 15,706 15,721 15,727 15,733 15,737 15,742 15,745 15,735 *Figures are in millions of Reais except where indicated (1) Earnings / dividends per share are calculated by dividing earnings / dividends by weighed average number of prefered and common shares outstanding. (2) Market capitalization based on share price from the last day of the year (3) Return on Equity = Net Income/Equity (4) Cash and Cash Equivalents less Bank Overdrafts The amounts in Reais/share and the number of shares were adjusted to reflect stock splits, reverse splits and bonus shares.
